commit.message:
re PR testsuite/46422 (FAIL: g++.dg/other/i386-?.C)

Fix PR target/46422.

2010-11-17  Quentin Neill  <quentin.neill.gnu@gmail.com>

	PR target/46422
	* config/i386/bmiintrin.h (__lzcnt_u16, __lzcnt_u32, __lzcnt_u64):
	Call the clz builtin.

From-SVN: r166889

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,9 @@
